item.description:
Taste the hottest and most interesting wines of the season!

European Wine tasting with many warm weather wines, so you can plan ahead for summer, as well as many exciting wines from all across Europe, including some great new arrivals! You'll not want to miss this great event!

WHEN: Thursday May 14th, 2009 at 7pm

WHERE: Bacon's Spirits of Hudson (Behind Applebee's)
234 Washington Street, Hudson MA 01749

WHY:
- test over 40 wines from France, Italy, Spain, Germany and Portugal
- test hors d'oeuvres courtesy of Harvest Café in Hudson and Brad’s Deli in Hudson
- get special Discounts on some wine purchases that evening only!

COST: FREE!!

B.Y.O.G - Bring your own glass or purchase one at the event to help Andrew's Helpful Hands

THIS IS A JOINT EVENT WITH: MetroWest 30s to 40s Singles Group
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a leopard print knit short sleeve shirt
item.name: Thurs 5/14 - FREE European Wine Tasting - Hudson MA
